div.a: Oak Hill Schools will be doing remote learning for the remainder of the year. Click the banner for latest information.

div.p: Established in 1957, Oak Hill United School Corporation offers K-12 education to students in Grant and Miami County. The mission of OHUSC is to work together with the community to empower each student with the knowledge, skills, and high standards to be successful, contributing members of our society.

Our corporation includes modern sports facilities and grounds, K-12 one-to-one technology device programs, numerous extracurricular activities, and great faculty and staff ready to give Oak Hill students the best school experience.
Oak Hill United School Corporation, where we empower students to be successful in a changing global society!
